verses.verse: וַיָּ֕שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shov with me came again הַמַּלְאָ֖ךְ <S%H4397><s%> ham-mal-'Ach And the angel הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> had-do-Ver that talked בִּ֑י Bi; וַיְעִירֵ֕נִי <S%H5782><s%> vay-'i-Re-ni and waked כְּאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ke-'Ish me as a man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who יֵע֥וֹר <S%H5782><s%> ye-'or that is wakened מִשְּׁנָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H8142><s%> mish-she-na-To. out of his sleep

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> mah What אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah I רֹאֶ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> ro-'Eh; unto me What seest; וַיֹּאמֶר vai-yo-mer כוָאֹמַ֡ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar said קרָאִ֣יתִי׀ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti I have looked וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold מְנוֹרַת֩ <S%H4501><s%> me-no-Rat and behold a candlestick זָהָ֨ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav all [of] gold כֻּלָּ֜הּ <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lah all וְגֻלָּ֣הּ <S%H1543><s%> ve-gul-Lah bowl עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹאשָׁ֗הּ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Shah, upon the top וְשִׁבְעָ֤ה <S%H7651><s%> ve-shiv-'Ah of it and his seven נֵרֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5216><s%> ne-ro-Tei-ha lamps עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha, on שִׁבְעָ֤ה <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'Ah thereon and seven וְשִׁבְעָה֙ <S%H7651><s%> ve-shiv-'Ah to the seven מֽוּצָק֔וֹת <S%H4166><s%> mu-tza-Kot, pipes לַנֵּר֖וֹת <S%H5216><s%> lan-ne-Rot lamps אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- are on רֹאשָֽׁהּ׃ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Shah. which [are] upon the top

וּשְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Na-yim And two זֵיתִ֖ים <S%H2132><s%> zei-Tim olive trees עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha; and אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad by it one מִימִ֣ין <S%H3225><s%> mi-Min upon the right הַגֻּלָּ֔ה <S%H1543><s%> hag-gul-Lah, [side] of the bowl וְאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> ve-'e-Chad and the other עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on שְׂמֹאלָֽהּ׃ <S%H8040><s%> se-mo-Lah. upon the left

וָאַ֙עַן֙ <S%H6030><s%> va-'A-'an So I answered וָֽאֹמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar, and spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמַּלְאָ֛ךְ <S%H4397><s%> ham-mal-'Ach to the angel הַדֹּבֵ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> had-do-Ver that talked בִּ֖י bi לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; with me saying מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh are these אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni. master

וַ֠יַּעַן <S%H6030><s%> Vai-ya-'an with me answered הַמַּלְאָ֞ךְ <S%H4397><s%> ham-mal-'Ach Then the angel הַדֹּבֵ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> had-do-Ver that talked בִּי֙ bi וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, about הֲל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo No יָדַ֖עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ta unto me Knowest מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah like אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh; these וָאֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar thou not what these be;And I said לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo No אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni. No my lord

וַיַּ֜עַן <S%H6030><s%> vai-Ya-'an Then he answered וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and spake אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, unto me saying זֶ֚ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh This דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- This [is] the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to זְרֻבָּבֶ֖ל <S%H2216><s%> ze-rub-ba-Vel unto Zerubbabel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor בְחַ֙יִל֙ <S%H2428><s%> ve-Cha-yil Not by might וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor בְכֹ֔חַ <S%H3581><s%> ve-Cho-ach, nor by power כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- but בְּרוּחִ֔י <S%H7307><s%> be-ru-Chi, but by my spirit אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot. of hosts

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- What אַתָּ֧ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you הַֽר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- hill הַגָּד֛וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol Who [art] thou O great לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei accept זְרֻבָּבֶ֖ל <S%H2216><s%> ze-rub-ba-Vel Zerubbabel לְמִישֹׁ֑ר <S%H4334><s%> le-mi-Shor; [thou shalt become] a plain וְהוֹצִיא֙ <S%H3318><s%> ve-ho-Tzi and he shall bring forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> ha-'E-ven stone הָרֹאשָׁ֔ה <S%H7222><s%> ha-ro-Shah, the top תְּשֻׁא֕וֹת <S%H8663><s%> te-shu-'ot [thereof with] shoutings חֵ֥ן <S%H2580><s%> chen [crying] Grace חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> chen grace לָֽהּ׃ <S%H99999><s%> Lah. פ Peh

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came unto me saying

יְדֵ֣י <S%H3027><s%> ye-Dei The hands זְרֻבָּבֶ֗ל <S%H2216><s%> ze-rub-ba-Vel, of Zerubbabel יִסְּד֛וּ <S%H3248><s%> yis-se-Du foundation הַבַּ֥יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of this house הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh of this וְיָדָ֣יו <S%H3027><s%> ve-ya-Dav his hands תְּבַצַּ֑עְנָה <S%H1214><s%> te-vatz-Tza'-nah; shall also finish וְיָ֣דַעְתָּ֔ <S%H3045><s%> ve-Ya-da'-ta, it and thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts שְׁלָחַ֥נִי <S%H7971><s%> she-la-Cha-ni hath sent אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem. about

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki For מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi who בַז֮ <S%H937><s%> vaz contempt לְי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> le-Yom the day קְטַנּוֹת֒ <S%H6996><s%> ke-tan-nOt of small וְשָׂמְח֗וּ <S%H8055><s%> ve-sa-me-Chu, will be glad וְרָא֞וּ <S%H7200><s%> ve-ra-'U and shall see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֶ֧בֶן <S%H68><s%> ha-'E-ven stones הַבְּדִ֛יל <S%H913><s%> hab-be-Dil plummet בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad in the hand זְרֻבָּבֶ֖ל <S%H2216><s%> ze-rub-ba-Vel of Zerubbabel שִׁבְעָה־ <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'ah- [with] those seven אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh; another עֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei they [are] the eyes יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah which מְשׁוֹטְטִ֖ים <S%H7751><s%> me-shot-Tim which run to and fro בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol throughout הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. through the whole earth

וָאַ֖עַן <S%H6030><s%> va-'A-'an Then answered וָאֹמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar I and said אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav; to him מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What שְּׁנֵ֤י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei unto him What [are] these two הַזֵּיתִים֙ <S%H2132><s%> haz-zei-Tim olive trees הָאֵ֔לֶה <S%H428><s%> ha-'E-leh, are these עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on יְמִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> ye-Min upon the right הַמְּנוֹרָ֖ה <S%H4501><s%> ham-me-no-Rah [side] of the candlestick וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and upon שְׂמֹאולָֽהּ׃ <S%H8040><s%> se-mo-Lah. and upon the left

וָאַ֣עַן <S%H6030><s%> va-'A-'an And I answered שֵׁנִ֔ית <S%H8145><s%> she-Nit, again וָאֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar and said אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav; to him מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What שְׁתֵּ֞י <S%H8147><s%> she-Tei unto him What [be these] two שִׁבֲּלֵ֣י <S%H7641><s%> shib-ba-Lei branches הַזֵּיתִ֗ים <S%H2132><s%> haz-zei-Tim, olive אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּיַ֗ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad, which through שְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei the two צַנְתְּר֣וֹת <S%H6804><s%> tzan-te-Rot pipes הַזָּהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> haz-za-Hav, golden הַֽמְרִיקִ֥ים <S%H7324><s%> ham-ri-Kim empty מֵעֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-lei-Hem and הַזָּהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> haz-za-Hav. the golden
